originalText.text:
Hi, please reply my email explaining the $170 express cleansing fee after I paid the $200+ moving out cleansing fee 3 months ago. And the last month’s rent is not legal, please revise the bill. Appreciated.

Yeah, I’m the have-to-leave-dear-resident  with the not-working-refrigerator in the kitchen for 5 months since last summer. Thank you.

originalText.text: I currently live in this building and I'm unsure where these positive reviews are coming from... maybe ten years ago it was like a 'cruise ship'. The gym is the draw but it all ends there. I don't use the gym so I don't care about that amenity. I care about my actual apt. All day and night I hear my neighbor's moving, their feet, their voices; above and below as clear as if in my apt. walls are paper thin. I smell their food which engulfs my apt like a restaurant kitchen all day and throughout the night. There are so many areas inside apt you realize after living for years that are cheap shoddy construction. I moved in 10 years ago and it was a completely different building. Only the bottom ten floors are actual apts. the top 30 are condos (not for rent through manager but through owners). The management company for the rentals only cares about your $ not your comfort. I can't move as it's tough in this city right now but I wouldn't dream of moving in as a new resident. Getting issue addressed will take weeks and if it's done; it's iffy will be done right. They show zero loyalty to long term residents and only care about enticing new residents. Do not recommend.

originalText.text:
It is like being on a cruise ship everyday. Amenity suite, concierge and doormen and onsite managment.  Walk out to beautiful riverside park with bike lanes and great playgrounds for the grand kids. Easy in and out of the city via on ramp to Westside highway.
Close to central park and Lincoln center. Amazng in everyway

originalText.text:
My fiancé and I moved to The Aldyn in fall 2020 and love it. The staff, concierge, and maintenance team is very attentive and friendly. The building is beautiful and modern with lots of great amenities - courtyard, gym, pool, basketball court, bowling alley, golf simulator, and children’s playroom. The apartment finishes and layouts are great and the neighborhood is fantastic!

Addendum 08/2022 - Thank you, Windsor team, for not only making our move-out so smooth but also for facilitating new tenants as quickly as possible. Minimizing the cost associated with overlapping apartments was much appreciated!

We miss the old place and hope the new tenants love it as much as we did!

originalText.text: Dyanna and everyone else that I worked with were fantastic.  Really helped me understand the options, listened to what I was looking for and made my apartment search easy.
